snippet.title: Tower Defense, But You're The ONLY Tower! (Steam Trailer)
snippet.description:
Turret Rampage is coming to Steam on October 18th! 🥳
• More info: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2520310/Turret_Rampage/

•  My Games: https://www.khud0.com/
•  Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Khud0

•  Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/Khud0
•  Discord: https://discord.gg/NMe8DcU
•  Twitter: https://twitter.com/Khud0Games

Hey, it's time for a new game trailer on the Khud0 - Indie Game Dev channel!

Meet Turret Rampage: a tower defense game, in which you're the only tower! To be more precise, you are a defensive turret, the only unit that stands between the remnants of humanity and the fierce underground invaders. Repel enemy waves by quickly moving between their tunnels and using the right weapons for every foe!

Defend humanity from underground monsters as the last standing turret! Force burrowers out of the ground with an artificial earthquake, capture elusive ghosts with silver shackles, and shatter alien bugs into pieces using powerful rockets!

Whether you're an indie game developer yourself, or you're interested in games made with Unity for some other reason, I'm looking forward to seeing you in my next devlog! Make sure to subscribe so that you don't miss it. ;)
